title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 816.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 816.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this regulation is to implement the
requirements of State Finance Law section 54(10)(s), which established the

Local Government Performance and Efficiency Program beginning in the State
fiscal year commencing April 1, 2011. The statute directed the Secretary of

State to adopt rules and regulations for the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
816.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
